they start with a layer of silver foil

that with gold and at this point it has
no polonium or radioactivity whatsoever
but then they pass the whole sandwich
into a particle accelerator and shoot
either protons or neutrons at it which
transmutes the bismuth into polonium-210
and the nice thing about this is that
you can control how many accelerated
particles you shoot at this thing and
can control how much of the bismuth is
transmuted into polonium so you don't
have to you know weigh out 10 nano grams
